name: Ogre Bash
description:
Kill as many ogres as possible!

I made this game from scratch in under 15 minutes. (In case you couldn't tell!) It was a personal challenge I set myself, to see what I could produce in as little time as possible. I think it turned out... alright. Not great, and not very deep but hey! 15 minutes!

Follow me on Twitter @LittleFishGames
